Body:
gsp = self.make_gsp({})
b, ind = gsp.shell_neighbors(self.centres, distance_lower_bound=self.
    lower_radii, distance_upper_bound=self.upper_radii)
for i, l in enumerate(ind):
    for j in l:
        d = np.fabs(self.data[j] - self.centres[i])
        assert_(d <= self.upper_radii * (1.0 + self.eps))
        assert_(d >= self.lower_radii * (1.0 - self.eps))
gsp = self.make_gsp({(0): (-self.lbox * 0.5, self.lbox * 0.5)})
b, ind = gsp.shell_neighbors(self.centres, distance_lower_bound=self.
    lower_radii, distance_upper_bound=self.upper_radii)
for i, l in enumerate(ind):
    for j in l:
        d = self.data[j] - self.centres[i]
        if d > 0.5 * self.lbox:
            d = d - self.lbox
        if d < -0.5 * self.lbox:
            d = d + self.lbox
        d = np.fabs(d)
        assert_(d <= self.upper_radii * (1.0 + self.eps))
        assert_(d >= self.lower_radii * (1.0 - self.eps))
